subject: p17439310
History: Evaluation of the patient after multiple transfusions.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to prior study obtained on. ET tube and right internal jugular line are in unchanged position. Heart size and mediastinum are stable. Improvement in aeration of the lung bases is demonstrated except for still present minimal left basal atelectasis and most likely present small left pleural effusion.
